definition: ballpoint pen/also written 圓珠筆|圆珠笔

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: Use a pen to write your name.
sentences.chinese: 用原子笔写下你的名字。

sentences.english: We sell pencils, and also sell ball-point pens.
sentences.chinese: 我们卖铅笔，也买原子笔。

sentences.english: For handwriting, please complete every item in block letters and in black or blue ink.
sentences.chinese: 如手写请用黑色或深蓝色原子笔，以正楷填写本表格。

sentences.english: Please complete every item in block letters and in black ink.
sentences.chinese: 请用黑色墨水笔或原子笔，以正楷填写各项。

sentences.english: Your homework must be printed on A4 paper with answers given in blue ball pens.
sentences.chinese: 功课必须用A4纸印出来，用蓝色原子笔作答。

sentences.english: The first ballpoint pens were sold in 1895. And they had their 1)share of problems.
sentences.chinese: 最早的原子笔在一八九五年卖出，这些笔都有些问题。

sentences.english: These biros can all write upside down.
sentences.chinese: 这些原子笔可以从各个方向书写。

sentences.english: Please complete this form in English BLOCK letters with black or blue ink.
sentences.chinese: 请用黑色或藍色原子笔以英文正楷填写各项。

sentences.english: Please complete legibly all parts in BLOCK LETTERS and in BLACK or BLUE INK.
sentences.chinese: 请用正楷及黑色或蓝色原子笔清楚填写表格。

sentences.english: Please complete the form in block letters and in black ink.
sentences.chinese: 请用黑色或深篮色原子笔或墨水笔，以正楷填写各项。

sentences.english: Is this a mechanical pencil or a ballpoint pen?
sentences.chinese: 这枝是自动铅笔还是原子笔？

sentences.english: I looked all over for my ball pen.
sentences.chinese: 我到处寻找我的原子笔。

sentences.english: Please complete all parts in BLOCK LETTERS and with PEN.
sentences.chinese: 请以正阶及原子笔填写以下各栏。

sentences.english: I would not go to Taipei for the mere purpose of buying a ballpoint (or ballpoint pen).
sentences.chinese: 我不会只为了买枝原子笔而去台北的。

definition: felt-tip pen/roller ball pen/gel ink pen
the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush/the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)
the shaft of a pen or writing brush/pen-holder/pen
ability to write/writing skill/written/in written form
